mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, nickname, profile_image AS profileImage, user_type AS userType, social_provider AS socialProvider, social_id AS socialId, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND user_type = #{userType}
SELECT * FROM users WHERE social_provider = #{socialProvider} AND social_id = #{socialId} AND is_active = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND is_active = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname} AND is_active = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE is_active = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, nickname, password, user_type, name, phone, address, profile_image, social_provider, social_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{userType}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{profileImage}, #{socialProvider}, #{socialId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = #{nickname}, user_type = #{userType}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET is_active = false, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
